document_data.mainbody:
House Brontej was a deceased drow house of Menzoberranzan.
In the , House Brontej was the 27 house of Menzoberranzan. Later that year, House Barrison DelArmgo  gathered their mages and took down House Brontej. All that remained of the house was a pool of sludge, that was suspiciously similar to the house insignia of House Barrison DelArmgo.
